goal.en: Help students understand the current development overview of bridge engineering and design practice cases.
goal.ch: 幫助學生瞭解現今橋梁工程發展概況及設計實務案例

content.en:
1 Brief introduction to the history and structure of the bridge
2 Basic concepts of bridge planning and design
3 Concrete bridge design
4 Steel bridge design
5 Analysis of the overall structure of the bridge
6 Seismic design of bridges
content.ch:
1 橋梁歷史簡介與構造概要
2 橋梁規劃與設計之基本概念
3 混凝土橋設計
4 鋼橋設計
5 橋梁整體結構分析
6 橋梁耐震設計

grading.en: Assignments, reports - 20％ Midterm Exam - 40％ (Week 9) Final Exam - 40％ (Week 16)
grading.ch: 作業、報告- 20％ 期中考- 40％(第9周) 期末考- 40％(第16周)

domain.en: 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程
domain.ch: 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程

en.competency: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習

ch.competency: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習

en: Department:MSc in Civil Engineering、PhD in Civil Engineering only.
